name: Duck Attack (Duck Hunt Clone)
description:
A simple High Score challenge version of the NES classic "Duck Hunt" where you have a limited number of lives that deplete every time a duck escapes to the top of the screen.

Click to shoot, but watch your ammo because you only have 3 shots before you'll need to reload (which is done automatically).

Exit and relaunch the game to start over after you reach a game over.

Made using ChiliTomatoNoodle's C++ DirectX Framework.
